name: JamBoy (ERIC_MACK)
description:
Come one and all to your local Jam Festival!

Press Start to begin building your very own JamBoy!

----------

CONTROLS:

A = [ Z ]

B = [ X ]

START = [ ENTER ]

SELECT = don't even worry about this one. 

----------

It's finally the weekend of the Jam Festival, you've been waiting on this for weeks!

The JamShop will be hosting and it's a video game enthusiast's dream: assemble your own handheld console and chat with fellow hobbyists while you do so.

What are you waiting for? Start Jammin' ! ! !

----------

You can download it and play it on original GameBoy / GameBoy Color hardware!!

Just place the rom onto a flash cartridge and you'll be able to build a JamBoy on a GameBoy.

----------

*This game was created in GB Studio for GBJAM9.

Special Thanks to https://gbstudiocentral.com/ and the folks over on the GB Studio Discord server for all of the much appreciated help!
